description: This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under TBIPS Supply Arrangement EN578-170432 who qualified under Tier 1 for the following category: B.7 Business Transformation Architect Level 3 (Senior)
full_summary:
=====================================================

**Business Transformation Architect Solicitation**
---------------------------------------------------

### Solicitation Details

*   Title: Business Transformation Architect
*   Reference Number: PW-22-01017314
*   Solicitation Number: 24062-23-324
*   Publication Date: December 15, 2022
*   Tender Closing Date: January 10, 2023, 2:00 p.m. Eastern Time

### Procurement Description

This solicitation is open to eligible vendors who have a Tier 1 qualification in Business Transformation Architect Level 3 (Senior) under the Treasury Board's Procurement Cards for Information Technology and Professional Services (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement (SA).

### Catergory of Procurement

*   Category: Service
*   North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Code: R019F (Management Consulting Services)
*   United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC): Not Applicable

### Geographical Scope

*   The contractor is expected to deliver services across Canada, with the primary location being the National Capital Region (NCR).

### End User

The buyer is the Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat, represented by the end user agencies.

### Solicitation Contact

*   Name: Lars Norgaard
*   Email: [lars.norgaard@tbs-sct.gc.ca](mailto:lars.norgaard@tbs-sct.gc.ca)
*   Phone: 343-550-7003

### Attachments

The attached documents provide detailed information on the proposed procurement.

*   English Version of Notice of Proposed Procurement: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/15/5972bc18129545faffac5b6b86f4e266/24062-23-324-_notice_of_proposed_procurement_npp_-_english_version.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/15/5972bc18129545faffac5b6b86f4e266/24062-23-324-_notice_of_proposed_procurement_npp_-_english_version.pdf)
*   French Version of Notice of Proposed Procurement: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/15/2c1a12a1caa3ed691dad307431193d18/24062
